item.title: The COVID winter wave has arrived. Here’s where it’s spreading during the 2024–25 holiday season
item.description: Weekly coronavirus test positivity rates have ticked up consistently since before Thanksgiving, CDC records show.

item.title: Elon Musk accused of trying to weaken Europe with support for far-right AfD party
item.description: Germany's vice chancellor said Musk's comments calling the far-right AfD a "last spark of hope" weren't made out of ignorance.

item.title: Move over, DINKs—companies are eyeing singles to buy their single-serve wine bottles amid loneliness epidemic
item.description: The nuclear family is dying. In its place are new household dynamics with different needs.

item.title: How to become a financial advisor: 4 steps to a life-long career
item.description: A career that can easily earn over $100k, financial advisors are needed more now than ever.
